mapper.select: SELECT ARTIST_NAME_KJ ,ARTIST_NAME_KN ,CATEGORY_DIV ,SALES_START_DATE ,DISP_PRICE ,IMG_PATH FROM ( SELECT CATEGORY_DIV ,ARTIST_CD ,SALES_START_DATE ,DISP_PRICE ,IMG_PATH FROM yohh.M_PRODUCT WHERE CATEGORY_DIV=#{categoryDiv} ) AS M_PRODUCT INNER JOIN yohh.M_ARTIST ON M_PRODUCT.ARTIST_CD =M_ARTIST.ARTIST_CD
